Omen.name: Omen
Omen.lore: A phantom of a memory, Omen hunts in the shadows. He renders enemies blind, teleports across the field, then lets paranoia take hold as his foe scrambles to uncover where he might strike next.

spells.name: Dark Cover
spells.description: EQUIP a shadow orb, entering a phased world to place and target the orbs. PRESS the ability key to throw the shadow orb to the marked location, creating a long-lasting shadow sphere that blocks vision. HOLD FIRE while targeting to move the marker futher away. HOLD SECONDARY FIRE while targeting to move the marker closer. RELOAD to toggle normal targeting view.

spells.name: Shrouded Step
spells.description: EQUIP a shrouded step ability and see its range indicator. FIRE to begin a brief channel, then teleport to the marked location.

spells.name: Paranoia
spells.description: EQUIP a blinding orb. FIRE to throw it forward, briefly reducing the vision range and deafening all players it touches. This projectile can pass straight through walls.

spells.name: From The Shadows
spells.description: EQUIP a tactical map. FIRE to begin teleporting to the selected location. While teleporting, Omen will appear as a Shade that can be destroyed by and enemy to cancel his teleport, or PRESS EQUIP for Omen to cancel his teleport.
